languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} targets an ally with an action (an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or an attack), that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of the Officer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This effect stacks and is prolonged until the end of the Officer's next turn each time it stacks.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g} выбирает союзника в качестве цели {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} или атаки, {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} этого союзника увеличивается на 1 до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} офицера. Эффект суммируется. При повторной активации его действие продлевается, но не далее чем до конца следующего хода офицера.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Leader targets an ally with an action (an ability or an attack), that ally's resolve is increased by +1 until the end of the Leader's next turn. This effect stacks and is prolonged until the end of the Leader's next turn each time it stacks.

Whenever the Leader targets an ally with an action (an ability or an attack), that ally's resolve is increased by +1 until the end of the Leader's next turn. This effect stacks and is prolonged until the end of the Leader's next turn each time it stacks. Cannot be prolonged past the Leader's next turn.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} targets an ally with an action (an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or an attack), that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of the Officer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This effect stacks and is prolonged until the end of the Officer's next turn each time it stacks.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g} выбирает союзника в качестве цели {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} или атаки, {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} этого союзника увеличивается на 1 до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} офицера. Эффект суммируется. При повторной активации его действие продлевается, но не далее чем до конца следующего хода офицера.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} targets an ally with an action (an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or an attack), that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of the Officer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This effect stacks and is prolonged until the end of the Officer's next turn each time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: Когда лидер выбирает союзника в качестве цели способности или атаки, решимость этого союзника увеличивается на 1 до конца следующего хода лидера. Эффект суммируется. При повторной активации его действие продлевается, но не далее чем до конца следующего хода лидера.

Когда лидер выбирает союзника в качестве цели способности или атаки, решимость этого союзника увеличивается на 1 до конца следующего хода лидера. Эффект суммируется. При повторной активации его действие продлевается, но не далее чем до конца следующего хода лидера.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}选择盟友为目标时（无论是{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}还是攻击），该盟友都会获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，效果持续至军官下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束为止。此效果可以叠加，每次叠加都可以使此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}时间延长，直到军官下个回合结束为止。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} targets an ally with an action (an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or an attack), that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of the Officer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} stacks and is prolonged until the end of the Officer's next turn each time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}选择盟友为目标时（无论是{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}还是攻击），该盟友都会获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，效果持续至军官下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束为止。此效果可以叠加，每次叠加都可以使此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}时间延长，直到军官下个回合结束为止。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} seleccione a un aliado como objetivo de una acción (una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} o un ataque), la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} de ese aliado aumenta en +1 hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del aliado. Este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} es acumulativo y se prolonga hasta el final del próximo turno del aliado cada vez que se acumula.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} targets an ally with an action (an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or an attack), that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of the Officer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} stacks and is prolonged until the end of the Officer's next turn each time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} seleccione a un aliado como objetivo de una acción (una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} o un ataque), la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} de ese aliado aumenta en +1 hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del aliado. Este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} es acumulativo y se prolonga hasta el final del próximo turno del aliado cada vez que se acumula.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} einen Verbündeten mit einer Aktion (einer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} oder einem Angriff) anvisiert, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} dieses Verbündeten bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Offiziers um +1 erhöht. Dieser Effekt ist stapelbar und wird mit jedem weiteren Stapel bis zum nächsten Zug des Offiziers verlängert.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} targets an ally with an action (an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or an attack), that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of the Officer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This effect stacks and is prolonged until the end of the Officer's next turn each time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Offizier einen Verbündeten mit einer Aktion (einer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} oder einem Angriff) anvisiert, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} dieses Verbündeten bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Offiziers um +1 erhöht. Dieser Effekt ist stapelbar und wird jedes Mal bis zum Ende des nächsten Zugs des Offiziers verlängert, wenn er gestapelt wird. Er kann nicht über den nächsten Zug des Offiziers hinaus verlängert werden.

Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} einen Verbündeten mit einer Aktion (einer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} oder einem Angriff) anvisiert, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} dieses Verbündeten bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Offiziers um +1 erhöht. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} ist stapelbar und wird mit jedem weiteren Stapel bis zum nächsten Zug des Offiziers verlängert.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} cible un allié avec une action ({g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ou attaque), la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g} de cet allié augmente de +1 jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'officier. Cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} est cumulable. À chaque cumul, il se prolonge jusqu'à la fin du tour suivant de l'officier.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} targets an ally with an action (an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or an attack), that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of the Officer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} stacks and is prolonged until the end of the Officer's next turn each time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} cible un allié avec une action ({g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ou attaque), la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g} de cet allié augmente de +1 jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'officier. Cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} est cumulable. À chaque cumul, il se prolonge jusqu'à la fin du tour suivant de l'officier.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}オフィサー{/g}がアクション（{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}または攻撃）で味方をターゲットにした時、その味方の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}がオフィサーの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで+1される。この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}は累積し、累積する度にオフィサーの次のターン終了まで効果が延長される。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} targets an ally with an action (an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or an attack), that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of the Officer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} stacks and is prolonged until the end of the Officer's next turn each time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}オフィサー{/g}がアクション（{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}または攻撃）で味方をターゲットにした時、その味方の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}がオフィサーの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで+1される。この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}は累積し、累積する度にオフィサーの次のターン終了まで効果が延長される。
